column4: hello  i've a web cam which i canot  seem to get working  with ubuntu could someone give me some  help ?

Check spaca5xx and if that driver support your cam
the model is  --> Creative Technology, Ltd WebCam PD1001
Search the Ubuntu forums, there are a page for this in there
